overview: When an uneasy truce between two of the drug world's top dogs goes sour, it's all-out war. Before long, bullets fly, bodies pile up and the streets are filled with blood as the rivals tear the underworld apart in a quest for outright supremacy. Things only go from bad to worse when a collection of dirty cops and corrupt federal agents throw their hats in the ring, angling for their piece of the drug game pie.
title: Bad Dealings
